import React from 'react' import { forecastType } from '../types' import Sunrise from './Icons/Sunrise' import Sunset from './Icons/Sunset' import { getSunTime } from '../../index' type Props = { data: forecastType } const Degree = ({ temp }: { temp: number }): JSX.Element => { return ( {temp} o ) } const Forecast = ({ data }: Props): JSX.Element => { const today = data.list[0] return (

{data.name},{data.country}

{today.weather[0].main} {today.weather[0].description}

H: L:{' '}

{data.list.map((item, i) => (

{i === 0 ? 'Now' : new Date(item.dt).getHours()}

))}
{getSunTime(data.sunrise)}
{getSunTime(data.sunset)}
) } export default Forecast
